title: ils插件
author: mailegebiao
txt_content:
在使用1.7.10的ILS插件时
我该怎样使被更改的物品伤害在4-6之间
已经配备了lores插件

replies.author: Crow__
replies.txt_content:
汉化过的配置文件:
/lore add 伤害: +4-6
未汉化
/lore add Damage: +4-6

replies.author: miejun
replies.txt_content:
ils lore 1 伤害: 4-6
尝试这个指令？？

replies.author: Crow__
replies.txt_content: 以后关于ILS的问题你还是问我吧

replies.author: mailegebiao
replies.txt_content:
麻烦了，能帮忙把所有的指令都发一下吗
Armour [护甲]
Health [生命值]
HealthRegen [生命回复]
Block [格挡]
Dodge [闪避]
CritChance [暴击几率]
LifeSteal [生命窃取]
Reflect [伤害反射]
Fire [着火]
Fire + 或 -<数值>%
Poison [中毒]
Poison + 或 -<数值>%
Level [等级需求]
WeaponSpeed [攻击速度]
Durability [耐久值]
SetBonu [金币加成]
Class [职业需求]
